titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: ORIGINAL DECIDED TO ADMIT DATE - Description

body.p: The date of the first DECISION TO ADMIT a PATIENT to a Health Care Provider , which results in an ELECTIVE ADMISSION LIST ENTRY . This date must be recorded on any subsequent ELECTIVE ADMISSION LIST ENTRIES regardless of any change in provider or commissioner. On the first ELECTIVE ADMISSION LIST ENTRY it will be the same as the DECIDED TO ADMIT DATE (this provider).
